bib.title: Handwritten Word Recognition with Combined Classifier Based on Tri-grams
bib.author: Sas, Jerzy and Zolnierek, Andrzej
bib.abstract: In the paper a new method of handwritten word recognition is described. In this method different probabilistic character language models (PCLMs) are used in order to improve the word recognition accuracy. These models consist of conditional probability distributions of characters given that preceding, succeeding or surrounding characters are known.
